BP.term: positive regulation of brown fat cell differentiation

interpro.desc: Fibronectin type III domain-containing protein 5, C-terminal domain

name: fibronectin type III domain containing 5
summary: This gene encodes a secreted protein that is released from muscle cells during exercise. The encoded protein may participate in the development of brown fat. Translation of the precursor protein initiates at a non-AUG start codon at a position that is conserved as an AUG start codon in other organisms. Alternative splicing results in multiple transcript variants. [provided by RefSeq, Jun 2013].
